amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $210 million for restoration activities in the Florida Everglades ecosystem.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to make available to the Secretary of the Interior $210 million in funds to conduct restoration activities in the Florida Everglades ecosystem.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foley amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 299 - 124 (Roll no. 39).
